question:
####UFAQ [Michael Boggs]
Can the Corp place the advancement tokens from the ability on Jemison Astronautics onto multiple cards?
answer:
No, all the advancement tokens must be placed on the same card.

If the Corp, playing as Jemison Astronautics, forfeits [Hostile Takeover](/en/card/01094) hosting [Political Graffiti](/en/card/10039), how many advancement tokens do they place on a card?
